subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: A fifth consecutive Wimbledon victory for Roger Federer would match Bjorn Borg’s modern men’s record for consistency and give Federer 11 Grand Slam titles.
snippet: A fifth consecutive Wimbledon victory for Roger Federer would match Bjorn Borg’s modern men’s record for consistency and give Federer 11 Grand Slam titles.
